## ContentItemWithLayout interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ContentItemWithLayout extends ContentItem 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [id](./api.contentitemwithlayout.id.md) | <code>string</code> | The ID of the content item. |
|  [layouts](./api.contentitemwithlayout.layouts.md) | <code>Layouts</code> | The layouts for the content item, ordered by mode. The 'default' mode always exists and denotes the default layout. |
|  [selectedLayouts](./api.contentitemwithlayout.selectedlayouts.md) | <code>AuthoringSelectedLayout[]</code> | Optionally the explicitly assigned layouts |
